Synopsis: Formats string or number of strings to Title Case
Description: Formats string or number of strings to Title Case allowing for prettty display

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
'me i feel good' | Format-ToTitleCase
Output:
Me I Feel Good
Not Feel

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 3
Examples.Code:
'me i feel', 'not feel' | Format-ToTitleCase
Output:
Me I Feel Good
Not Feel

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 4
Examples.Code:
Format-ToTitleCase -Text 'This is my thing' -RemoveWhiteSpace
Output:
ThisIsMyThing

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 5
Examples.Code: Format-ToTitleCase -Text "This is my thing: That - No I don't want all chars" -RemoveWhiteSpace -RemoveChar ',', '-', "'", '\(', '\)', ':'
